text: ORCL INVESTOR ALERT: KESSLER TOPAZ MELTZER & CHECK, LLP ENCOURAGES ORCL INVESTORS WITH LOSSES TO CONTACT THE FIRM. THIS ACTION, CAPTIONED BARROWS V. ORACLE CORPORATION, ET AL., CASE NO. 1:26-CV-00127-JLH, WAS FILED ON FEBRUARY 3, 2026, IN THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT FOR THE DISTRICT OF DELAWARE AND IS PENDING BEFORE THE HONORABLE JENNIFER L.
